Hello, I'm Nihar Gupta Chinta

I am a DevOps Engineer at SLB where I build and maintain the infrastructure for the company. I enjoy exploring new technologies and building products that bring my ideas to life. I received my Master’s degree in Computer Science from the University of Massachusetts Amherst in 2024.

My Hiking Adventures

Mountain Peak Adventure

Rocky Mountain National Park • 2024-08-15
2,800 ft 8.5 miles Moderate

Amazing sunrise hike to the mountain peak with breathtaking views of the valley below. The trail was challenging but rewarding with beautiful wildflowers along the way.

Lakeside Trail Exploration

Glacier National Park • 2024-09-02
1,500 ft 6.2 miles Easy

Peaceful walk around the crystal-clear mountain lake with incredible reflections and wildlife sightings including eagles and deer.
